function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate wearing of face masks and coverings in areas with known or suspected community transmission of COVID-19 virus","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Promote and enforce the consistent and correct wearing of face masks in high-risk areas, along with other preventive measures","Technologies":"Advanced mask materials with improved filtration and fluid dynamics","People":"General public in areas with known or suspected community transmission","Owner":"Public health authorities and local governments"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding of the effectiveness of cloth-based face masks in reducing the emission of particles","Impact":"Limited adoption of effective preventive measures","Mitigation":"Conduct and communicate research on the effectiveness of cloth-based face masks, and provide clear guidelines on their use","Technologies":"Particle capture and filtration testing technology, public health communication tools","People":"Manufacturers, general public","Owner":"Public health research institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate integration of face masks and coverings with other preventive measures such as social distancing and hand hygiene","Impact":"Reduced overall effectiveness of preventive strategies","Mitigation":"Provide clear and consistent public health messaging on the importance of combining face masks with other preventive measures","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, digital media platforms","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health authorities and health education organizations"}]}
